attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: consider the fact that the payment for this outrageously costly event is to be paid for with public money, OUR MONEY, those hardworking people from the whole of the UK.  Stop wasting OUR MONEY and get those London fat cats who will benefit from this event to bankroll this already terrifyingly lossmaking event.

rejection.details:
There are already several petitions on this issue
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=olympic+games
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=olympics
Please consider signing an existing petition, rather than creating another.

If you decide to resubmit - the title of a petition must be a call to action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
